nodes.text: Lourna Dee's Tempest was one of the three Tempests within the Nihil and was led by the Tempest Runner Lourna Dee. It consisted of about one thousand members. As many Nihil who served in a Tempest took after their Runner, the Nihil of this Tempest were considered to be the most sadistic, as well as planners who only performed their jobs at the right time when they knew they would succeed.
